Description:
Required Skills to be successful:-The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of developing data-driven campaigns that drive exceptional ROI both on a direct basis, as well as longer term brand metrics. 
Establish, implement and measure the effectiveness of digital paid advertising initiatives to drive customers to locally relevant websites  
Drive digital branding initiatives, specially on YouTube Video Ads, social media channels for relevant markets and have a full understanding of the digital branding metrics. 
Have solid knowledge of all performance marketing tactics across multiple advertising channels. (Display / SEM / Paid Social / App). 
Develop, execute and optimise every aspect of paid channels/campaigns (keyword development, ad copywriting, audience segmentation, bid management, budget monitoring, etc.) 
Analyse paid marketing KPIs by channel/campaign and dynamically reallocate the budget to maximize the KPIs. 
Contribute to setting the marketing plan for each country and forecasting targets and KPIs for paid marketing channels. 
Be in constant coordination with all marketing, design & branding teams. 
Provide periodic campaign performance, forecasts and trend data analysis. 
PPC and Paid social Bid Management tools (FB Manager, Adwords, Marin, GA36, ROI Hunter, Smartly) 
Web analytics experience (Google Analytics, SiteCatalyst). 
Experience in Retargetting platforms (Criteo, RTB)  
Experience in App platforms & app installs (Adjust, Taptica, Apple search ads, Moblin, Inmobi) 
Comfortable using BI tools (Tableau, Power BI) 
Advanced skills in MS Excel 
Experience using a CDP is a plus  What equips you for the role:Bachelor Degree
5+ years in performance marketing (PPC, programmatic and Paid Social) and 10 years in the field.
Positive, and can-do attitude 
Analytical skills, from knowledge of tracking tools such as Google Analytics, to understanding the digital marketing and branding KPIs 
Understanding of digital marketing from a technical point of view 
Very organized, structured 
Very good communication skills 
Very curious and outgoing Job Details
